data.title: Prairie View, Texas Population 2024
data.text:
Prairie View is a city located in Grimes County, Harris County, and Waller County Texas. Prairie View has a 2024 population of 8,576. Prairie View is currently growing at a rate of 1.14% annually and its population has increased by 4.75% since the most recent census, which recorded a population of 8,187 in 2020.

The average household income in Prairie View is $32,204 with a poverty rate of 44.66% . The median age in Prairie View is 20.6 years: 20.8 years for males, and 20.6 years for females.

Prairie View Demographics

According to the most recent ACS, the racial composition of Prairie View was:

Black or African American : 90.3%

Two or more races : 5.03%

White : 3.51%

Other race : 0.87%

Asian : 0.21%

Native American : 0.07%

Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander : 0.01%
